summary: Comprehensive testing of Smart Livestock Care (SLC) - Veterinarian Phase 1 features completed. All backend APIs (17 tests) passed with 100% success rate. Frontend UI testing verified Vet Dashboard, Vet Profile, Institution Data, and OPD Register functionality.

backend: Vet login with invalid password returns 401 - PASSED
Vet login with wrong role returns 401 - PASSED
Create vet profile with mandatory fields - PASSED
Registration number cannot be changed once saved - PASSED
Create new institution with required fields - PASSED
Create OPD case with all fields - PASSED
Create OPD case with zoonotic disease (Brucellosis) - PASSED
Get single OPD case by ID - PASSED
OPD case number format OPD-YYYY-XXXXX - PASSED
frontend: Vet login flow with role selection - PASSED
Vet Dashboard - summary cards (OPD/IPD/Vaccinations/AI/Mortality) - PASSED
Vet Dashboard - alerts panel showing zoonotic disease alert - PASSED
Vet Dashboard - quick action buttons (New OPD Case navigates correctly) - PASSED
Vet Dashboard - overall statistics display - PASSED
Vet Dashboard - zoonotic safety reminder banner - PASSED
Vet Profile - displays registration details with lock message - PASSED
Vet Profile - shows 'Registration number cannot be changed once saved' - PASSED
Vet Profile - institution & location details - PASSED
Institution Data - list of institutions with pending verification badge - PASSED
Institution Data - Add New Institution dialog with all fields - PASSED
Institution Data - note about admin verification lock - PASSED
OPD Register - case list with correct format OPD-2026-XXXXX - PASSED
OPD Register - serial numbers displayed (S.No: 1-5) - PASSED
OPD Register - result badges (Ongoing Treatment, Recovered) - PASSED
OPD Register - zoonotic alert displayed for Brucellosis case - PASSED
OPD Register - New OPD Case dialog with all fields - PASSED
OPD Register - zoonotic warning when entering high-risk diagnosis - PASSED
OPD Register - species filter working - PASSED
OPD Register - result filter working - PASSED
OPD Register - search functionality available - PASSED

seed_data_creation: Test OPD cases created during backend testing with TEST- prefix tags. Vet profile created with TEST-VET-REG registration number.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Phase 1 Vet features are working correctly. Backend APIs tested with pytest (17 tests). Frontend UI tested with Playwright for login, dashboard, profile, institution, and OPD register. Zoonotic disease alerts working for Brucellosis, Anthrax, etc. OPD case numbering follows OPD-YYYY-XXXXX format. Registration number lock is enforced.

vet_dashboard.summary_cards: OPD Cases Today, IPD Admissions, Vaccinations Done, AI Cases, Mortality Cases
vet_dashboard.alerts_panel: Shows zoonotic disease alerts for high-risk cases
vet_dashboard.quick_actions: New OPD Case, Diagnostics, Registers, Certificates, Knowledge Center, Reports
vet_dashboard.overall_statistics: Total OPD Cases, Total IPD Cases, Animals Registered, Pending Follow-ups

vet_profile.registration_details: Registration Number (locked), Qualification, Mobile Number, Date of Joining
vet_profile.institution_location: Institution Name, Working Village, Mandal, District, State
vet_profile.lock_message: Registration number cannot be changed once saved

institution_data.institution_list: Shows institutions with pending verification badge
institution_data.add_institution: Dialog with Institution Name, Location, Mandal, District, State, Contact, Jurisdiction Villages
institution_data.verification_note: Institution data will be locked after admin verification

opd_register.case_list: Shows cases with OPD-YYYY-XXXXX format and serial numbers
opd_register.case_details: Tag number, Species, Owner, Village, Diagnosis, Result badge
opd_register.zoonotic_alert: Red warning for high-risk diseases (Brucellosis, Anthrax, etc.)
opd_register.new_case_dialog: Patient & Farmer Details, Clinical Details, Result, Remarks
